pullrequest.title: add if-exists to check whether msgs folder exists, to pass the tutorial message in https://ignitionrobotics.org/api/transport/7.0/messages.html

content.raw:
I tried removing the `msgs` folder to test compiling the examples, and it gives an error:

~~~
CMake Error at CMakeLists.txt:112 (add_dependencies):
  The dependency target "protobuf_compilation" of target
  "subscriber_custom_msg" does not exist.


CMake Error at CMakeLists.txt:103 (add_dependencies):
  The dependency target "protobuf_compilation" of target
  "publisher_custom_msg" does not exist.
~~~

I think the following would fix it:

~~~
diff -r 90f685aa340f example/CMakeLists.txt
--- a/example/CMakeLists.txt	Mon Apr 08 17:20:24 2019 +0000
+++ b/example/CMakeLists.txt	Tue Jun 04 11:56:02 2019 -0700
@@ -92,7 +94,7 @@
     ignition-transport${IGN_TRANSPORT_VER}::core)
 endif()
 
-if (EXISTS "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/publisher_custom_msg.cc")
+if (TARGET protobuf_compilation AND EXISTS "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/publisher_custom_msg.cc")
   add_executable(publisher_custom_msg publisher_custom_msg.cc)
   target_link_libraries(publisher_custom_msg
     ignition-transport${IGN_TRANSPORT_VER}::core
@@ -101,7 +103,7 @@
   add_dependencies(publisher_custom_msg protobuf_compilation)
 endif()
 
-if (EXISTS "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/subscriber_custom_msg.cc")
+if (TARGET protobuf_compilation AND EXISTS "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/subscriber_custom_msg.cc")
   add_executable(subscriber_custom_msg subscriber_custom_msg.cc)
   target_link_libraries(subscriber_custom_msg
     ignition-transport${IGN_TRANSPORT_VER}::core
~~~
content.html:
I tried removing the msgs folder to test compiling the examples, and it gives an error:

CMake Error at CMakeLists.txt:112 (add_dependencies):
  The dependency target "protobuf_compilation" of target
  "subscriber_custom_msg" does not exist.


CMake Error at CMakeLists.txt:103 (add_dependencies):
  The dependency target "protobuf_compilation" of target
  "publisher_custom_msg" does not exist.

I think the following would fix it:

diff -r 90f685aa340f example/CMakeLists.txt
--- a/example/CMakeLists.txt    Mon Apr 08 17:20:24 2019 +0000
+++ b/example/CMakeLists.txt    Tue Jun 04 11:56:02 2019 -0700
@@ -92,7 +94,7 @@
     ignition-transport${IGN_TRANSPORT_VER}::core)
 endif()

-if (EXISTS "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/publisher_custom_msg.cc")
+if (TARGET protobuf_compilation AND EXISTS "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/publisher_custom_msg.cc")
   add_executable(publisher_custom_msg publisher_custom_msg.cc)
   target_link_libraries(publisher_custom_msg
     ignition-transport${IGN_TRANSPORT_VER}::core
@@ -101,7 +103,7 @@
   add_dependencies(publisher_custom_msg protobuf_compilation)
 endif()

-if (EXISTS "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/subscriber_custom_msg.cc")
+if (TARGET protobuf_compilation AND EXISTS "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/subscriber_custom_msg.cc")
   add_executable(subscriber_custom_msg subscriber_custom_msg.cc)
   target_link_libraries(subscriber_custom_msg
     ignition-transport${IGN_TRANSPORT_VER}::core
